fr.intro: Tutoriels et guides etape par etape pour les outils techniques et les environnements du CERN.

desc.en: Step-by-step guide for connecting VS Code to CERN lxplus and other Linux servers using WSL and SSH on Windows.
desc.es: Guia paso a paso para conectar VS Code a lxplus del CERN y otros servidores Linux usando WSL y SSH en Windows.
desc.it: Guida passo-passo per connettere VS Code a CERN lxplus e altri server Linux usando WSL e SSH su Windows.
desc.fr: Guide etape par etape pour connecter VS Code a CERN lxplus et d'autres serveurs Linux en utilisant WSL et SSH sous Windows.

desc.en: Set up Kerberos authentication and SSH access to CERN lxplus, EOS, and AFS from any platform.
desc.es: Configura la autenticacion Kerberos y el acceso SSH a lxplus, EOS y AFS del CERN desde cualquier plataforma.
desc.it: Configura l'autenticazione Kerberos e l'accesso SSH a CERN lxplus, EOS e AFS da qualsiasi piattaforma.
desc.fr: Configurez l'authentification Kerberos et l'acces SSH a CERN lxplus, EOS et AFS depuis n'importe quelle plateforme.

desc.en: Get started with the ROOT data analysis framework: installation, first histogram, PyROOT, and reading .root files.
desc.es: Empieza con el framework ROOT: instalacion, primer histograma, PyROOT y lectura de archivos .root.
desc.it: Inizia con il framework di analisi dati ROOT: installazione, primo istogramma, PyROOT e lettura di file .root.
desc.fr: Demarrez avec le framework d'analyse de donnees ROOT : installation, premier histogramme, PyROOT et lecture de fichiers .root.

desc.en: CERN GitLab setup, SSH keys, Kerberos authentication, merge request workflow, and CI/CD basics.
desc.es: Configuracion de CERN GitLab, claves SSH, autenticacion Kerberos, flujo de merge requests y CI/CD basico.
desc.it: Configurazione di CERN GitLab, chiavi SSH, autenticazione Kerberos, workflow delle merge request e basi di CI/CD.
desc.fr: Configuration de CERN GitLab, cles SSH, authentification Kerberos, workflow des merge requests et bases du CI/CD.

desc.en: Computing account, eduroam Wi-Fi, EDH, ServiceNow, VPN, printing, and what to do when things break.
desc.es: Cuenta informatica, Wi-Fi eduroam, EDH, ServiceNow, VPN, impresion y que hacer cuando algo no funciona.
desc.it: Account di calcolo, Wi-Fi eduroam, EDH, ServiceNow, VPN, stampa e cosa fare quando qualcosa non funziona.
desc.fr: Compte informatique, Wi-Fi eduroam, EDH, ServiceNow, VPN, impression et que faire quand quelque chose ne marche pas.

desc.en: Mandatory safety course, radiation protection, e-learning modules, and 3-year renewal requirements.
desc.es: Curso obligatorio de seguridad, proteccion radiologica, modulos e-learning y renovacion cada 3 anos.
desc.it: Corso di sicurezza obbligatorio, protezione radiologica, moduli e-learning e requisiti di rinnovo triennale.
desc.fr: Cours de securite obligatoire, protection radiologique, modules e-learning et renouvellement tous les 3 ans.

desc.en: Card types, badge wearing rules, vehicle access, ADaMS Mobile, and lost card procedures.
desc.es: Tipos de tarjeta, normas de uso del badge, acceso de vehiculos, ADaMS Mobile y procedimiento por perdida.
desc.it: Tipi di carte, regole per il badge, accesso veicolare, ADaMS Mobile e procedure per carte smarrite.
desc.fr: Types de cartes, regles de port du badge, acces vehicule, ADaMS Mobile et procedures en cas de perte.

desc.en: 40% telework limit, supervisor approval, OC No. 7 framework, and location flexibility rules.
desc.es: Limite del 40% de teletrabajo, aprobacion del supervisor, marco OC No. 7 y reglas de flexibilidad de ubicacion.
desc.it: Limite del 40% di telelavoro, approvazione del supervisore, quadro OC n. 7 e regole di flessibilita sulla sede.
desc.fr: Limite de 40% de teletravail, approbation du superviseur, cadre OC n¬∞ 7 et regles de flexibilite du lieu.

desc.en: CERN EOS distributed storage: quotas, CERNBox web and desktop sync, accessing files from lxplus and SWAN, and sharing.
desc.es: Almacenamiento distribuido EOS del CERN: cuotas, CERNBox web y sincronizacion de escritorio, acceso desde lxplus y SWAN, y compartir archivos.
desc.it: Storage distribuito EOS del CERN: quote, CERNBox web e sincronizzazione desktop, accesso da lxplus e SWAN, e condivisione.
desc.fr: Stockage distribue EOS du CERN : quotas, CERNBox web et synchronisation bureau, acces depuis lxplus et SWAN, et partage.

desc.en: CERN lxplus interactive cluster: available resources, home directories, CVMFS software, HTCondor batch jobs, and fair-share policy.
desc.es: Cluster interactivo lxplus del CERN: recursos disponibles, directorios home, software CVMFS, trabajos batch HTCondor y politica de uso justo.
desc.it: Cluster interattivo lxplus del CERN: risorse disponibili, directory home, software CVMFS, job batch HTCondor e politica di fair-share.
desc.fr: Cluster interactif lxplus du CERN : ressources disponibles, repertoires home, logiciels CVMFS, jobs batch HTCondor et politique de partage equitable.

desc.en: CERN SWAN service: creating Jupyter notebooks, EOS storage, ROOT/Python analysis, and sharing with colleagues.
desc.es: Servicio SWAN del CERN: crear notebooks Jupyter, almacenamiento EOS, analisis ROOT/Python y compartir con colegas.
desc.it: Servizio SWAN del CERN: creare notebook Jupyter, storage EOS, analisi ROOT/Python e condivisione con i colleghi.
desc.fr: Service SWAN du CERN : creer des notebooks Jupyter, stockage EOS, analyse ROOT/Python et partage avec les collegues.
